page.title: 18MENDIP HILLS
page.content: THE NORTH SECTION OF THIS BLOCK IS DOMINATED BY THE RISING HILLS OF MENDIP WITH THE LOX YEO VALLEY FORMING A CENTRAL DIVIDE THROUGH WHICH PASSES THE BUSY M5. THESE HILLS OF CARBONIFEROUS LIMESTONE WITH THEIR RED SANDSTONE CORE FORM AN UNDULATING LANDSCAPE FAMILIAR TO MANY PEOPLE WHO TODAY WALK OR RIDE THE MANY TRACKWAYS WHICH CROSS THEM. WHERE SMALL SETTLEMENTS EXIST,THERE A SCAR IN THE HILLSIDE INDICATES THE SOURCE FOR MUCH OF THE STONE OF WHICH THE EARLY HOUSES ARE CONSTRUCTED.THUS THE UNSPOILT VILLAGES APPEAR TO RISE OUT OF THE HILLSIDE AND TO BE A PART OF IT.THIS IS NOW OCCASIONALLY SPOILT BY BRICK BUILDINGS,CEMENT COVERED AND COLOUR WASHED.
